MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: SNES music player and MIDI converter
English.Char_Desc_80: SNES music player and MIDI converter
English.Char_Desc_250: Spc2Midi can play the songs from Super Nintendo games, display the musical information, allow you to assign properties to the sounds, and export the song to MIDI format to use with music authoring programs and electronic keyboards.
English.Char_Desc_450: Spc2Midi can play the songs from Super Nintendo games, display the musical information, allow you to assign properties to the sounds, and export the song to MIDI format to use with music authoring programs and electronic keyboards.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Spc2Midi can play the songs from Super Nintendo games, display the musical information, allow you to assign properties to the sounds, and export the song to MIDI format to use music authoring programs and electronic keyboards. The reason I wrote this was so I could see the notes to play them on my keyboard (since playing by ear takes a lot of trial and error). Two other useful alternatives exist (SpcTool by AntiRes and a converter by Gigo), but neither of them support immediate song seeking or have enough automated audio analysis features.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: -Copy and redistribute freely (if you find it useful). -Keep all documentation in archive intact (give credit where it is due). -Include a link to the program page (if you can spare the page space). -Decompile at your whim (if you really have nothing better to do).
Permissions.EULA: -Your cost to use this program is a single email telling me what useful projects you found for it (if any). It has no monetary cost. -The only certainty you get is that it is free of spyware and bloatware coding practices. -There is no guarantee it will correctly function on your machine's peculiar configuration (only that it worked without problems on my machine when I released it). In fact, I can almost guarantee there exists at least one undiscovered bug in it (being only human). Use it at your discretion as it has no warranty.
